summary: This is a Completely New HD Re-texture of the ugly Low Res Dwarven CrossBow From the Dawnguard Dlc.........
descriptionHtml:
This is a Completely New HD Re-texture of the ugly Low Res Dwarven CrossBow From the Dawnguard Dlc . SHINY!!!!! 

What this mod does is it replaces the default Dwarven Crossbow Texture With a brand new High Resolution 2048x Quality texture which is polished :) Who knew High quality Could Be SEXY!!!!!!!!!!!!

Enjoy guys :) and Endorse if u like 

Be sure to Check out my other crossbow Retexture!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22901

WANT A SLIVER VERSION !!!!!! Variant coming soon
author: GameNinjaPro
